Posts.Content: Hi well I called in today to a natural doctor and spoke with him! He advised D3, 5,000mg. Taken with a fish oil, for better absorption, Quercetin 500mg. 2x per day, Inositol 500mg 2x pr day along with Berberine. I'll be trying it, good luck!
Posts.Title: Natural alternatives to Als meds

Posts.Content: Good luck, what doctor, name, and state are you seeing? You can private message me if you want! Best of luck on Thursday, please let me know how you make out!! Hugs ??
Posts.Title: Natural alternatives to Als meds

Posts.Content: Hi, I was diagnosed with breast cancer Sept. 1, 2016. It was a stage 1 and my lymph nodes were all clear. I chose to do the radical thing and had a double mastectomy with reconstruction on Oct. 3, 2016, done at the same time in one surgery! Best thing I ever did! I come off my hrt as of this Friday, I had to come off gradually because of the amount of estradiol I was on! The onco wants me to go on Femara/letrozole, after reading about all the side effects, I want to go natural! Any thoughts? I would appreciate any ideas! Thanking you in advance!
Posts.Title: Natural alternatives to Als meds
